snippet.title: Ashen Knights: Foreshadow | TokyoGameShow'22 Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Ashen Knights: Foreshadow on Steam: s.team/a/2008200

Follow Ashen Knights and myriads of amazing new games at TokyoGameShow2022, starting September 15th.

As the Abyss devoured the world,
Once fertile lands were wrecked and torn
By wretched and voracious spawn.
In blood the villages were drowned.
From every home the life was gone.
Born from revenge, arisen Ashen Knights.
The chosen ones, who only live to fight
In deadly combat, battling the Abyss!
But can they win?

Steam:
Ashen Knights: Foreshadow: https://s.team/a/2008200
Ashen Knights: One Passage: https://s.team/a/2021230
Discord: https://discord.gg/jH6P9UGZ8k
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ashen_knights
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@ashen_knights
